text: Bless me Father, for I have sinned.
I have promised
people that I would save them...
but I have not been keeping my word.
But I’m going to do everything I can to stop it.
So, I guess we should add “prideful defiance”
to my list of sins, huh?
Eli, it’s been an honor to watch you
grow up to be the man you are today.
I need you to go undercover.
There’s a new player in town and…
they don’t play by no rules.
Oh, Jesus.
We got another victim here.
This looks like an outbreak of serial murders.
You ever get comfortable with violence?
Not like some guys.
I'll do what needs to be done.
Stay down!
Sergeant, take him outside.
Guys, Jet’s in trouble.
Where is she?
Do not make me bury you.
